item.description:
This is not a boring party!  Meet someone new this Friday at the BYOB singles party at Daniels Hall, Route 4, Nottingham, NH. Very inexpensive night out as you bring your own liquor (we give free drink set-ups) and you don't have to tip bartenders. Casual dress, so everyone is in a friendly mood, $12 admission (which includes a free buffet). Every week there are new singles to meet, as the dance party has been heavily advertised for the last 17 years. Singles  ages 30 t0 60 normally attend.  For more info call 603 942-8525 or singles@worldpath.net Doors open at 7:30 PM for free hot buffet and music starts at 8 PM and goes to midnight.

 

For more info on the singles parties at Daniels Hall, visit their web site at www.singlesdanceparties.com

group.name: Find someone new this Friday! Ages 30 to 60.

item.name: Singles dance party at Daniels Hall
